overview: You can lock your doors and hide, but it won't matter. In Criminal Intent, resistance is futile as a pack of hardened criminals and their victims - led by TitanMen Leo Alarcon, David Anthony, Dario Beck, Tony Buff and Will Parker - lead an orifice assault that spits in the face of law and order. Bend over and take it like a man in this frenzied display of forcible entry, where breaking and entering never felt so good.
title: Criminal Intent
